wikipedia_page.main:
Dylan McLaughlin (born 19 February 1995 in Greenock) is a Scottish footballer who plays for junior side Port Glasgow.
He started his senior career with Greenock Morton in the Scottish Football League First Division.

response: Dylan McLaughlin (born December 2, 1993) is an American actor. He has appeared in television series including ER and Bones as well the motion pictures Alice Upside Down, Georgia Rule, and Kicking & Screaming. He has also appeared as Benji in iCarly.
